website_summaries.verdict: Make 7 homemade cupcakes or muffins fast: from 5 to 8 minutes. Final product is perfectly done on outside, but moist on the inside.
pros: Fun for young kids and for adults who want to make mini desserts for parties, gifts or anytime
Pink unit looks great on counters and won't take up space
cons: The outside of this cupcake making machine gets extremely hot
Kids shouldn't use it on their own and it could use better handles for easier opening

customer_reviews.title: So adorable!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter received this for Christmas. We made the recipe for vanilla cupcakes included in the instruction book, which made about 2.5 batches for the machine. We didn't use cupcake liners, and they came out light and fluffy. The manual recommends a 5-6 minute bake time, but we found that a slightly longer bake time worked better. The cupcakes released easily. On the last batch, we didn't have enough batter to villa every cup, but the empty spaces didn't affect the quality of the cupcakes. Great little machine for bite-sized cupcakes.
customer_reviews.author: T. Jacobs

customer_reviews.title: Great for your kids who love to bake
customer_reviews.text: Great for your kids who love to bake. My daughter is now baking and frosting and decorating cupcakes like a pro. She baked and decorated mini-cupcakes for her own birthday party which were a big hit with her friends.
customer_reviews.author: pjh

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use but gets very hot!
customer_reviews.text: The idea behind this purchase was to let the kids play in the kitchen, I was thinking the interior of the unit would be hot but not the exterior, the whole tihng gets VERY hot very quickly so kids can't really pour the mixture or take the cupcakes out on their own. cooks cupcakes pretty well in about 5-7 minutes and is easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Alekz

customer_reviews.title: easiest cupcakes ever
customer_reviews.text: my 11-year-old loves this cupcake baker. it works perfectly for us - the cupcakes (using cake mix, because she makes less mess that way than making them from scratch) bake in 6.5 minutes and slip right out if the baking cups with no paper liners. cupcakes are bite-sized - perfect!
customer_reviews.author: eliza

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: My niece has one and it works fantastic. Cupcakes in minutes. She can individually decorate each one, and gets to do all the mixing and measuring herself. It's better that making a whole big batch, and having to heat the oven. This way, you just make a few and there's no wastage. It works so well, I bought this one for my 3 & 5 year old nieces.
customer_reviews.author: ARAli

customer_reviews.title: Great product. Very good
customer_reviews.text: I'm posting this after almost a year of use and so far holding perfectly. Great product. Very good choice
customer_reviews.author: millita

customer_reviews.title: Cupcake Maker
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a gift for my daughter who is in college. She loves it. Perfect sized cupcakes that bake super fast. It is also very easy to clean. And SO cute!!
customer_reviews.author: A. Black

customer_reviews.title: Makes great treats and food.
customer_reviews.text: Makes great cupcakes and other things. It is a lot easier than a conventional oven. Any one, especially those with children, who want to make a treat.
customer_reviews.author: CSL

customer_reviews.title: My daughter wanted an Easy Bake Oven
customer_reviews.text: My daughter wanted an Easy Bake Oven...we got this instead. SHE LOVE IT! It is so easy to use and I love that it is pink.

customer_reviews.title: Cool Cupcakes
customer_reviews.text: Works well, bakes quickly. Haha, actually kinda worried about the speed. xD. This is a cool product. It bakes mini cupcakes, and thoroughly pleases the owner. I find 7-11 minutes is good. I'm going to try to use it to bake mini muffins. Yum. That'll be tasty.
customer_reviews.author: Anastasia

customer_reviews.title: GREAT
customer_reviews.text: I can make a TON of cute little mini cupcakes with just one box of cake mix! Try making mini marbled cupcakes! SUPER cute!

customer_reviews.title: Better than an easy bake oven.
customer_reviews.text: This is a much better buy for your kids than an easy bake oven

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: The girls loved it, it worked great, and was fast. Couldn't be more pleased with the purchase for my graddaughters.

customer_reviews.title: Love It
customer_reviews.text: My little girl loves to make cupcakes with this. Fast and easy to use. Great present for anyone who like to bake.

customer_reviews.title: odor
customer_reviews.text: I think I prefer to make cupcakes the old fashioned way. this is a bit smelly.

customer_reviews.title: So much better than an Easy Bake Oven!
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my daughter for Christmas and she loved it. The only drawback is the steam that comes out of it when you open the lid...but if you wear an oven mit that is not a problem. Because of the steam this is a very adult supervised activity.

customer_reviews.title: The first impression counts ...
customer_reviews.text: When my wife pulled the product from the box, he dropped the illusions that he had been motivated to buy this mini CupCake. Opening it, he was missing a screw, was broken in the back and the cover is out of position.The returned it to the box, and I hope if I ever use it, that at least fit well the CupCake. I feel that we lost money. Mini CupCake seems rebuilt.
customer_reviews.author: Pedro Linares

customer_reviews.title: My daughter uses it quite a bit and loves it.
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves this thing and makes stuff all the time with it. Seems to have held up ok. She's 11 now and has used it fairly often... we've had it for a year or two as I recall. Just like a normal hot iron like thing, just pink. :)
customer_reviews.author: myamazon1360

customer_reviews.title: super fun
customer_reviews.text: This thing is awesome! Makes perfect bit size cupcakes that are just the right size for kids. One batch of cake mix made over 50 of them and they are easy to frost. If you cook them without the papers it makes them have this perfect crisp bottom. I am very happy with this product... one word of caution this thing gets extremely hot and you are not supposed to peek. I burnt myself cause I was curious lol.
customer_reviews.author: Crystina

customer_reviews.title: OK
customer_reviews.text: The price is good, but it's difficult to use without burning yourself. I bought it for my daughter (to use with help), but she's too scared to get anywhere near it because it's so hot. It needs a better handle on the top or front so you can open it more easily. I have to use a pot holder to open it.
customer_reviews.author: R. M. Witt

customer_reviews.title: Great fun
customer_reviews.text: i bought this for my granddaughter and she used it to make cupcakes for all of her class parties. It makes us both happy to use and enjoy our time together. Plus it something she can use by herself. I use it once to make a dessert for a Xmas party I went to and I love it also. Do not need to use liners. Very nice.
customer_reviews.author: barbbbb

customer_reviews.title: Works great. Makes up yummy cupcakes or muffins in a ...
customer_reviews.text: Works great. Makes up yummy cupcakes or muffins in a matter of 5 minutes. I make gluten free muffins and cupcakes because my kid has celiac and it works great and they are the perfect size for toddler hands.

customer_reviews.text: I love it!! it doesn't mention this in the pictures, but there is also on the bottom of it a holder for the cord... makes perfect cupcakes for any occasion!! Come out Excellent!!

customer_reviews.title: Sunbeam Mini-Cupcake maker
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for an 11 yr old girl. She absolutely LOVED it! She made 52 mini cupcakes with one cake mix box. They are adorable, yummy and the machine was very easy for her to use.

customer_reviews.title: Incredibly easy
customer_reviews.text: I made these for my kids during my vacation week. It works and is so easy. Within 5 - 7 minutes the muffins are perfectly done. And they were eaten just as quickly.

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use, young people can make their, own cupcake faster, I always advise adult supervision ever, is fast and the product comes out perfect. The cupcake easy to clean and do not stick. I Buy several and gift to my family.

customer_reviews.title: Really Good!
customer_reviews.text: This product arrived super quick. I've made so many batches of cupcakes with this and they all come out perfectly. I have no complaints with this product. The pink color is really cute, too!

customer_reviews.text: This c/m maker works really good. The only reason I gave it four stars is....that when you open it, hot steam rolls out. Other wise it works real well.

customer_reviews.title: Works well, really tiny cupcakes

customer_reviews.text: This is a great little product. My kids can operate it without any problem, it cooks evenly, cool on the outside and cleans up. We love it for cupcakes and muffins.

customer_reviews.text: It is assumed that the mini cupcakes are ready in eight minutes but actually take longer than 20 minutes .....

customer_reviews.title: Yes I would buy this again.
customer_reviews.text: I used the recipe (in the encluded book) for vanilla cupcakes but used lemon extract instead of vanilla. Makes enough batter for 3 batches of 7. Just perfect. I tried the final batch without paper cups and they work fine if you like a little more of a crispy outside. The tops didn't brown but they were totally cooked. No clean up to speak of. Didn't have to heat up an oven. Very nifty little gadget. BTW I bought one of the used/like new ones listed for a few $$ savings. Looks new to me but the box had been opened is all.
customer_reviews.author: Linda

customer_reviews.title: Great gift to your kids!
customer_reviews.text: I gave this present to my seven years niece.. and she loved it! Simple to use and Quickly to warm.
customer_reviews.author: lorena

customer_reviews.title: This thing is all I expected. I bought it ...
customer_reviews.text: This thing is all I expected. I bought it for my 10 year old daughter who loves cooking and baking and she loves it!
customer_reviews.author: Melinda

product_meta.title: Sunbeam FPSBCMM901 Mini-Cupcake Maker, Pink
product_meta.description: Let your imagination help you create and decorate your favorite cupcakes and muffins. Make incredible homemade cupcakes with less energy and time than oven baking. Uniquely designed cupcake holes allow you to create 7 cupcakes in 5-8 minutes.
feature_bullets: Enjoy fresh baked delicious cupcakes or muffins with the fun shaped sunbeam cupcake maker
Make incredible homemade cupcakes with less energy and time than oven baking
Uniquely designed cupcake holes allow you to create 7 cupcakes in 5-8 minutes
Easy-lift handle designed for easy and safe use
Non-stick plates make clean up easy
Enjoy fresh baked delicious cupcakes or muffins
Make incredible homemade cupcakes with less energy and time than oven baking
Uniquely designed cupcake holes allow you to create 7 cupcakes in 5-8 minutes
Easy-lift handle designed for easy and safe use
Nonstick plates make clean up easy

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.0 out of 5 stars88 ratings4.0 out of 5 stars
